short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: User can store, update, and copy their stored details and autofill any type of form with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Easily store, manage, and organize your details with the **Make Life Easy** Chrome Extension. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to keep their thoughts and details organized.

Features:

📋 Save Details with Topic and Description
- Quickly input and save your details with a topic and description for easy reference.

📅 Optional Date and Category
- Include additional information such as date and category to keep your details organized.

✏️ Edit and Delete
- Modify or remove your saved details at any time.

📋 Copy to Clipboard
- Copy the description of any detail to your clipboard with a single click.

🔍 Read More/Less Toggle
- Expand to read the full content of lengthy details or collapse them to save space.

💻 Responsive Design
- Works well on all device sizes, ensuring a pleasant user experience.

🌙 Dark Mode
- Toggle dark mode for a comfortable viewing experience in low-light environments.

⚡ Autofill Forms
- Quickly autofill forms with previously saved details.

How to Use:

1. Save a Detail: Open the extension, fill in the topic and description, and optionally add a date and category. Click 'Save' to store your detail.
2. View Saved Details: Scroll through your saved details categorized by their assigned categories.
3. Edit or Delete: Use the 'Edit' button to update a detail or the 'Delete' button to remove it.
4. Copy Description: Click the 'Copy' button to copy the detail's description to your clipboard.
5. Expand/Collapse Details: Use the 'Read more' button to expand and read the full description. Click 'Read less' to collapse it.
6. Autofill Forms: Click the 'Autofill Forms' button to automatically fill forms with your saved details on the current webpage.


By using Make Life Easy, you can ensure that all your important details are organized and easily accessible, helping you stay on top of your tasks and responsibilities.
